name: A(ir)lien
description:
Made during a gamejam running 13-17 June 2016.

Goal:

Survive for as long as possible & get the highest score by shooting the aliens into the walls and holes.

For 1-4 players!

Controls:

XBOX controller:

Left stick -> move

Right stick -> aim

Shoot with triggers. Charge air by holding down.

Made by
Elias Granfelt - Programming

Ludwig Hallberg - Sound

Per Bengtsson - Design

Viktor Ljungdahl - Art
